subject: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError being thrown in test class' constructor
msgSnippet: I m getting the following exception when running my a unit test via junit-4.4:
messageBody:

junit-4.4:
<<

Here's the constructor where the exception is being thrown:
<<
public AppSettingsEditorPanelTest()
{
super(new Module[] { new NetworkTestModule() }, false);
}
>>

I really have no clue what's causing this. Everything compiles; the
super class constructor I'm calling exists... Can anyone point out what
I'm doing wrong here?
